p: We downloaded historical meteorological data from the KNMI server for the Dutch meteorological reference station De Bilt (KNMI 2015). We then compared modelled concentrations per climate scenario (next section) to modelled concentrations of a historical climatic period (1981â€“2010) as a function of season and as a function of changes in temperature, wind speed, precipitation, and global radiation. We did not assume any other future developments, such as urbanisation.
